app

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller class of the applications. It contains a number of methods, which server as "broker" between the data model and view elements. Class and its methods are completely static and can be accessed from any place of the application (the public ones).
    Author:
    Vlada47

    • Method Detail

      • endAppConfirmed

        public static boolean endAppConfirmed()
        Method for confirmation of exiting the application.
        Returns:
        true/false

      • setGuiReferences

        public static void setGuiReferences(LeftPane lp,
                                    CenterPane cp)
        Method which saves the references to main GUI instances, so the controller can make changes on GUI.
        Parameters:
        lp - instance of the left pane
        cp - instance of the center pane

      • characterBuildInstanceExists

        public static boolean characterBuildInstanceExists()
        Method that informs, if the build was started/loaded. It is used for saving build functionality.
        Returns:
        true/false

      • setInfoFieldsDisable

        public static void setInfoFieldsDisable(boolean disable)
        Method, which purpose is to disable fields with values on the left pane. It calls setTextFieldsDisable method from LeftPane class.
        Parameters:
        disable - true/false

      • setBuildNotesDisable

        public static void setBuildNotesDisable(boolean disable)
        Method, which purpose is to disable text area and save button for notes on the left pane. It calls setExtensionPaneDisable method from LeftPane class.
        Parameters:
        disable - true/false

      • setGeneralTabDisable

        public static void setGeneralTabDisable(boolean disable)
        Method, which purpose is to disable the general tab on center pane. It calls setGeneralTabDisable method from CenterPane class.
        Parameters:
        disable - true/false

      • setGeneralTabControlDisable

        public static void setGeneralTabControlDisable(boolean disable)
        Method, which purpose is to disable the combo boxes and confirm button of the general tab. It calls setGeneralTabControlDisable method from CenterPane class.
        Parameters:
        disable - true/false

      • setDevelopmentTabsDisable

        public static void setDevelopmentTabsDisable(boolean disable)
        Method, which purpose is to disable skill and attributes tabs on the center pane. It calls setSkillTabDisable and setAttrDistribTabDisable method from CenterPane class.
        Parameters:
        disable - true/false

      • setWarningStatus

        public static void setWarningStatus(boolean wStatus)
        Setter for the warningStatus variable.
        Parameters:
        wStatus - true/false

      • getWarningStatus

        public static boolean getWarningStatus()
        Getter for the warningStatus variable.
        Returns:
        current value of the warningStatus variable

      • saveBuild

        public static void saveBuild(java.io.File file)
        Method servicing the functionality for saving the file with current build serialization. It uses ObjectOutputStream to write the serialized CharacterBuild object. If the build was saved successfully, the information alert is displayed, otherwise the error alert will appear.
        Parameters:
        file - target file for the build's content

      • loadBuild

        public static void loadBuild(java.io.File file)
        Method servicing the functionality for loading the file with saved build serialization. It uses ObjectInputStream to read the serialized CharacterBuild object. If the build was loaded successfully, the information alert is displayed, otherwise the error alert will appear. Depending on the value of the buildSet attribute of the object, different GUI parts are enabled/disabled.
        Parameters:
        file - source file with the build's content

      • createCharacter

        public static void createCharacter()
        Method, which initiates the characterBuild object and creates the array with Skill instances for it. Then it calls other methods, which creates more starting data for the build instance.

      • confirmNewBuild

        public static boolean confirmNewBuild()
        This method represents sort of a control, when starting a new build. In case the characterBuild instance is already set, the confirmation alert is displayed. If user confirms the action, method returns true otherwise false.
        Returns:
        confirmation of the action (true/false)

      • setBuildBase

        public static void setBuildBase(RaceEnum race,
                                GenderEnum gender,
                                SpecializationEnum specialization,
                                PrimaryAttrEnum primaryAttribute,
                                SecondaryAttrEnum secondaryAttribute,
                                BirthsignEnum birthsign)
        Method, which sets up general build creation (when confirming the choices on the general tab). It takes passed choices (selected enum values) and saves them in the data model. More attributes on data model are modified depending on aforementioned choices (exact values are taken from BuildConstants class). At the end it sets up buildSet attribute of the build instance on true (indicating it is now in development state).
        Parameters:
        race - selected race
        gender - selected gender
        specialization - selected specialization
        primaryAttribute - selected primary attribute
        secondaryAttribute - selected secondary attribute
        birthsign - selected birthsign

      • clearBuild

        public static void clearBuild()
        Method, which initiates new build by calling createCharacter method. It is used, when "Reset" button on general tab is used. It saves the notes by storing them shortly in its String and setting it back to the build.

      • confirmBuildReset

        public static boolean confirmBuildReset()
        This method represents sort of a control, when reseting the build. If user confirms the action, method returns true otherwise false.
        Returns:
        confirmation of the action (true/false)

      • increaseAttribute

        public static void increaseAttribute(PrimaryAttrEnum attribute)
        Method, which services increasing of chosen primary attribute per character level gained. It first calculates the target level, for which the attribute is being increased and then checks, whether this level is lesser or equal to current character level. If yes, then the attribute is added to its respective stack and also to the list of attribute gains. Current value of that attribute is also increased on the build. If not, then the alert may be shown to inform the user that all levels of the character has been used to distribute primary attributes.
        Parameters:
        attribute - chosen attribute to increase

      • decreaseAttribute

        public static void decreaseAttribute(PrimaryAttrEnum attribute)
        Method, which services decreasing of chosen primary attribute per character level gained. Unless the stack of chosen attribute is empty, it pops the last one and removes (by calling removeAttribute method) it from list of all distributed primary attributes. It then decrease the current value of the respective attribute in the build.
        Parameters:
        attribute - chosen attribute to decrease

      • changeSkill

        public static void changeSkill(SkillEnum skill)
        Method for switching currently set skill (when user selects different one on skill tab).
        Parameters:
        skill - the skill, which will be switched to

      • takeSkillLevel

        public static void takeSkillLevel()
        Method which handles increasing of the currently set skill level and resulting calculations of the character's main level. Unless the skill is on the maximal level, it gets increased on the build and then it is calculated (with the aid of few other methods) how much experience points was gained by the skill level increase. If the experience gained is big enough for advance in the main character level, this level value is increased by 1 and perk points available are increased by respective amount.

      • removeSkillLevel

        public static void removeSkillLevel()
        Method which handles decreasing of the currently set skill level and resulting calculations of the character's main level. Unless the skill is on the minimal level or the character has some perk chosen, which requires the current level, it gets decreased on the build and then it is calculated (with the aid of few other methods) how much experience points was lost by the skill level decrease. If the experience lost is big enough for losing the main character level, this level value is decreased by 1 and perk points available are decreased by respective amount.

      • resetSkill

        public static void resetSkill()
        Method, which handles reseting currently chosen skill. It decreases the skill level to starting value of the character and removes all perk investments. Character level and perk points available are calculated accordingly. It basically works in the same way as takeSkillLevel and removeSkillLevel, it basically loops the removing the skill level and it is modified by some incomprehensible black magic.

      • takePerkLevel

        public static void takePerkLevel(int perkIndex)
        Method, which handles taking perk level process. It finds perk's instance from passed perkIndex value. Then it checks for skill level requirement of respective perk level, if the level is not high enough, alert may be displayed informing the user. If it is, then level is taken, unless the method takeLevel from Perk class returns false (in that case another alert may be displayed). Amoun of perk points available is then decremented by 1.
        Parameters:
        perkIndex - index of the perk, which the level is being invested in

      • removePerkLevel

        public static void removePerkLevel(int perkIndex)
        Method, which handles removing perk level process. It finds perk's instance from passed perkIndex value. Unless there is no level taken yet in this perk, the last level invested is removed and amount of perk points available is incremented by 1.
        Parameters:
        perkIndex - index of the perk, which the level is being remove from

      • saveBuildNotes

        public static void saveBuildNotes(java.lang.String notes)
        Method, which stores passed String into build's notes.
        Parameters:
        notes - notes to be saved
